Articles.Content: Hello, my name is pauldbk99, you might know me from some ridiculous necro posting back in the day, anyway i've abandoned ksp a bit lately, because I have been playing other games like EU4 and Civ5, but I might just have back in love with this game!. Has anything changed on the forum lately?

Only that we've missed you!

The next potential updates are going be dramatic and I'd suggest hanging on a minute. Potentially, they are out soon, but that speculation is based of two updates of the releases that are posted in the forums usually inside 2 weeks of release. They will include the Roverdude antenna remote-tech style mod where line of site is required and they fixed the aero and heat models to be more realistic.

You are in for a much more delicious treat.

Yeah, there are a lot of changes, and more coming.

Welcome back!

Abandoned KSP?

Confessing your return?

As you wish. You are a Kerbal soul. Exchange your mortal needs with ludicrous need for snacks, boosters and TWR.

Praise the Kraken for its cuteness.

Enter the church of Whackjob.

Adopted.
Hello and welcome back to the forums!
